Adobe Dynamic Media Classic.name: Adobe Dynamic Media Classic
Adobe Dynamic Media Classic.description: Adobe Dynamic Media Classic is a platform that enables customers to manage, enhance, publish, and deliver dynamic rich media content and personal experiences to consumers across all channels and devices, including web, print material, email campaigns, desktops, social, and mobile.

Brandfolder.name: Brandfolder
Brandfolder.description: Brandfolder is a cloud-based digital asset management platform.

Bynder.name: Bynder
Bynder.description: Bynder is a cloud-based marketing platform where brands create, find, and use all their digital content.

Image Relay.name: Image Relay
Image Relay.description: Image Relay is a digital asset management system that allows organizations to upload, manage, organize, monitor and track their digital assets.

Nextcloud.name: Nextcloud
Nextcloud.description: Nextcloud is a suite of client-server software for creating and using file hosting services.

Widen.name: Widen
Widen.description: Widen is a digital asset management and product information management solutions provider.

Zmags Creator.name: Zmags Creator
Zmags Creator.description: Zmags Creator enables marketers to design and publish endless types of interactive digital experiences without coding.

Aprimo.name: Aprimo
Aprimo.description: Aprimo is a United States-based company that develops and sells marketing automation software and digital asset management technology.

Bluestone PIM.name: Bluestone PIM
Bluestone PIM.description: Bluestone PIM is primarily a product information management (PIM) solution, which is focused on managing and distributing product data across multiple channels. However, it also includes some features that are typically associated with digital asset management (DAM), such as the ability to manage and store product images, videos, and other digital assets.

Canto.name: Canto
Canto.description: Canto is a digital asset management solution.

Celum.name: Celum
Celum.description: Celum is a software developer that specialises in enterprise digital asset management and marketing content management systems.

Censhare.name: Censhare
Censhare.description: Censhare is a commercial digital experience platform in the form of an enterprise content management system.

Frontify.name: Frontify
Frontify.description: Frontify is a cloud-based brand management platform for creators and collaborators of brands.

keep. archeevo.name: keep. archeevo
keep. archeevo.description: keep. archeevo is an archival management software that aims to support all the functional areas of an archival institution, covering activities ranging from archival description to employee performance assessment.

PhotoShelter for Brands.name: PhotoShelter for Brands
PhotoShelter for Brands.description: PhotoShelter for Brands is a cloud-based media management system for companies and organizations.

Picturepark.name: Picturepark
Picturepark.description: Picturepark is designed to facilitate your DAM policies by storing, tagging, searching and delivering files in an automated and controlled way.

Salsify.name: Salsify
Salsify.description: Salsify is a product experience management platform which connects digital asset management, content syndication, and digital catalog capabilities.
